definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Our digital communication network has been engineered so that copies flow with as little friction as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们的数字通信网络被打造成让拷贝流尽量畅通无阻。

sentences.english: COFDM is a digital communication technique of multicarriers.
sentences.chinese: COFDM技术是一种多载波数字通信技术。

sentences.english: Digital communication is entering the technical field of traditional HV switchgear.
sentences.chinese: 数字通信正在进入高压开关设备这个传统的技术领域。

sentences.english: Orthogonal Frequency Division Multiplexing(OFDM) is a kind of multicarrier digital modulation technique.
sentences.chinese: 正交频分复用技术是一种多载波数字通信调制技术。

sentences.english: I've always known my kids use digital communications gear a lot.
sentences.chinese: 一直以来，我知道我的孩子们频繁使用数字通信设备。

sentences.english: Bit-synchronous circle is a basic and key technology in digital communication.
sentences.chinese: 位同步是数字通信中的一项基础而又关键的技术。

sentences.english: It is equipped with digital communication, GPS receivers and inter-vehicle digital links.
sentences.chinese: 它配备了数字通信，GPS接收器和跨车辆数字链接。
